title: Ennatha Solla Lyrics Endrendrum Punnagai Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Ennatha solla
Singer(s): Karthik, Haricharan, Velmurugan, Ramesh Vinayagam
Movie: Endrendrum Punnagai
Music: Harris Jayaraj
Lyrics: Viveka

Ennatha solla innum ennatha solla
solla varthaye illa
nimmadhi illa ini nimmadhi illa
ponnu life long tholla (2)

Mayil pola varuvaa
puduhu podha tharuva
nee ponnoda serndhaale
mannaavaa maamaa ..

Ammi midhikka vacha karanam enna
konjam enni paarudaa maamaa ..
ava unna midhika seiyum othigadhaaney
nalla purinjika da maamaa.

Vela bendu mimithi, unna kandapadithaan
ava aati padaipaa maamaa .
ava kaluthulathaan manja kayira katti
namma maati kollurom aamaa ..(Ennatha solla )

Happy man-ah paartha arumugam ippa
BP-u vandhu paduthuputtaan
coffee tea-a kooda kayil thodaa nanben
quaterula kulichiduraan

Ye ponnum poli ava lifeum poli
oru noolu thaali adhil neeyum gaali
torture-u da ponu torture-u da

endha marriage-umey iruttu
batchlore-a neeum kootathadichaa
nee sollvadhellaam right-u ..(Ennatha solla )

Otha thalagaani pudhumada saami
kattikitte thoongikollalaam
vaaiku rushiyaaga vakkanaya thinna
cook-u onnu vachi kollalaam

chinna raagam theera, ... venaam
oru roata thaanda aeroplane-u vendaam

Moochu mutta neeyum kudichiputtu
poi moolayila thoongu
pechu thuna venumuna
nalla radio va vaangu (..Ennatha solla..)
